1 <?php

3 namespace Ubiquity\orm\parser;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
6 use Ubiquity\orm\OrmUtils;
7 use Ubiquity\db\SqlUtils;
8 
19 class ConditionParser {
20  private $firstPart;
21  private $condition;
22  private $parts = [ ];
23  private $params;
24  private $invertedParams = true;
25 
26  public function __construct($condition = null, $firstPart = null, $params = null) {
27  $this->condition = $condition;
28  $this->firstPart = $firstPart;
29  if (is_array ( $params )) {
30  $this->setParams ( $params );
31  }
32  }
33 
34  public function addKeyValues($keyValues, $classname, $separator = " AND ") {
35  if (! is_array ( $keyValues )) {
36  $this->condition = $this->parseKey ( $keyValues, $classname );
37  } else {
38  if (! UArray::isAssociative ( $keyValues )) {
39  if (isset ( $classname )) {
40  $keys = OrmUtils::getKeyFields ( $classname );
41  if (is_array ( $keys )) {
42  $keyValues = \array_combine ( $keys, $keyValues );
43  }
44  }
45  }
46  $retArray = array ();
47  foreach ( $keyValues as $key => $value ) {
48  if ($this->addParams ( $value )) {
49  $retArray [] = SqlUtils::$quote . $key . SqlUtils::$quote . " = ?";
50  }
51  }
52  $this->condition = implode ( $separator, $retArray );
53  }
54  }
55 
56  public function setKeyValues($values) {
57  if (! is_array ( $values )) {
58  $this->params = [ $values => true ];
59  } else {
60  $this->params = [ ];
61  foreach ( $values as $val ) {
62  $this->addParams ( $val );
63  }
64  }
65  }
66 
67  private function addParams($value) {
68  if (! isset ( $this->params [$value] )) {
69  return $this->params [$value] = true;
70  }
71  return false;
72  }
73 
74  public function addPart($condition, $value) {
75  if ($this->addParams ( $value )) {
76  $this->parts [] = $condition;
77  return true;
78  }
79  return false;
80  }
81 
82  public function addParts($condition, $values) {
83  foreach ( $values as $value ) {
84  if ($this->addParams ( $value )) {
85  $this->parts [] = $condition;
86  }
87  }
88  }
89 
90  public function compileParts($separator = " OR ") {
91  if ($separator == " OR " && sizeof ( $this->parts ) > 3) {
92  $parts = $this->refactorParts ();
93  $conditions = [ ];
94  foreach ( $parts as $part => $values ) {
95  $values [0] = "SELECT ? as _id";
96  $conditions [] = " INNER JOIN (" . implode ( " UNION ALL SELECT ", $values ) . ") as _tmp ON " . $part . "=_tmp._id";
97  }
98  $this->condition = implode ( " ", $conditions );
99  } else {
100  $this->condition = implode ( $separator, $this->parts );
101  }
102  }
103 
104  private function refactorParts() {
105  $result = [ ];
106  foreach ( $this->parts as $part ) {
107  $part = str_replace ( "= ?", "", $part );
108  $result [$part] [] = '?';
109  }
110  return $result;
111  }
112 
113  private function parseKey($keyValues, $className) {
114  $condition = $keyValues;
115  if (strrpos ( $keyValues, "=" ) === false && strrpos ( $keyValues, ">" ) === false && strrpos ( $keyValues, "<" ) === false) {
116  if ($this->addParams ( $keyValues )) {
117  $condition = SqlUtils::$quote . OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $className ) . SqlUtils::$quote . "= ?";
118  }
119  }
120  return $condition;
121  }
122 
127  public function getCondition() {
128  if ($this->firstPart == null)
129  return $this->condition;
130  $ret = $this->firstPart;
131  if (isset ( $this->condition )) {
132  $ret .= " WHERE " . $this->condition;
133  }
134  return $ret;
135  }
136 
141  public function getParams() {
142  if (is_array ( $this->params )) {
143  if ($this->invertedParams) {
144  return array_keys ( $this->params );
145  }
146  return $this->params;
147  }
148  return;
149  }
150 
155  public function hasParam($value) {
156  if (is_array ( $this->params )) {
157  if ($this->invertedParams) {
158  return isset ( $this->params [$value] );
159  }
160  return array_search ( $value, $this->params ) !== false;
161  }
162  return false;
163  }
164 
165  public function countParts() {
166  if (is_array ( $this->params ))
167  return sizeof ( $this->params );
168  return 0;
169  }
170 
175  public function setCondition($condition) {
176  $this->condition = $condition;
177  return $this;
178  }
179 
184  public function setParams($params) {
185  $this->params = $params;
186  $this->invertedParams = false;
187  return $this;
188  }
189 
190  public function limitOne() {
191  $limit = "";
192  if (\stripos ( $this->condition, " limit " ) === false) {
193  $limit = " limit 1";
194  }
195  $this->condition .= $limit;
196  }
197 
198  public static function simple($condition, $params) {
199  $cParser = new ConditionParser ( $condition );
200  $cParser->addParams ( $params );
201  return $cParser;
202  }
203 }
